Hey! I’m Budi Tanrim and welcome to Yellowstroke.com

Using a multidisciplinary approach, Budi help companies to build products to make impact in human's life. He is currently working on Design System and Design Process for one of the largest eCommerce product in Indonesia, Bukalapak. He is currently getting acclimated to the humidity in Jakarta, Indonesia. In this blog, he continuously shares some of his learnings that can benefit the readers. Read his interview with Interfacelovers.com

Pronounce
